Log To Console

test.name: User tires to enter invalid choice

kw.name: Given user enters the invalid choice
Whilefun
kw.msg: Menu: 1. Add Question and Answer 2. Delete Question and Answer 3. Display Questions and Answers 4. Start Game 5. Quit
${Invalid_choice} = Invalid choice. Please select a valid option.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Invalid choice. Please select a valid option.

kw.name: When User should not get any choice
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Whilefun
kw.msg: Menu: 1. Add Question and Answer 2. Delete Question and Answer 3. Display Questions and Answers 4. Start Game 5. Quit
${Invalid_choice} = Invalid choice. Please select a valid option.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Invalid choice. Please select a valid option.

test.name: User wants to delete the question that doesnt exist

kw.name: Given The user access the question
Log To Console
kw.arg: User access the file which contains questions and answers
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: When User wants to delete the question that dont exist
Delete Question
kw.msg: ${del_question} = {'What is Your name ?': 'Gunaseelan', 'What is Your Age ?': '25', 'What is Your Qualificaiton ?': 'BE', 'How Many years of Experience do you have ?': '2 years', 'What is Your Role ? ': 'Automation Eng...

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: User tries to delete the invalid question
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Then Verify the question cannot be deleted
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Question Who are you
